DataElement.preferredName: Standardized Uptake Value Lean Body Mass Corrected Or Other Measurement Outcome Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that describes the results of a Standardized Uptake Value corrected for lean body mass (SUL) or other measurement results.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Standardized Uptake Value Lean Body Mass Corrected Or Other Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) / [injected dose (nCi) / body weight (g)]._The mass of the body minus the fat._Having had errors or mistakes removed._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) 1[injected dose (nCi) 1 body weight (g)].

Concepts.definition: An effectively dimensionless measure of regional tracer uptake calculated as the activity concentration within a 2D region of interest (ROI) or 3D volume of interest (VOI) measured on a PET image (nCi1mL) / [injected dose (nCi) / body weight (g)].
